name: test-homaze
description: ●Implemented design should be “pixel-perfect” ● Code should be clear, have performance optimized, no console log printings ● CSS should be well-defined and have clear names ● You’re welcome to use any CSS/React plugin library ● Preferable to use Redux (preferable) or another app state container library ● Preferable to use React Hooks ● Consider the screen is used by desktop and by mobile users. ● Data should be fetched from some mock API (mocki.io, mockapi.io etc) ● JSON response found here [here](https://codebeautify.org/jsonviewer/y232b92c2)
author: Avi Stepovyi
